			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_random_handicap_perc value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_random_handicap_perc }

			divide_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = 2000 }
			subtract_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor value = custom_difficulty_tmp }

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -55.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -45.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_-5 days = -1 }

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value < -35.000 }

			}
			else_if = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value > 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_-10 days = -1 }

				limit = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_command_limit_mult }

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_megastructure_build_cap_add }

			limit = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

				}

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_-10

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_starbase_upgrade_speed_mult_20

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-6

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-4

				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_edict_length_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_-7 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_trade_value_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult value < -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_-9 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_11 days = -1 }
			}

				limit = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_growth_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult }

			limit = {
				NOT = {

				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_piracy_suppression_mult_-7

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_branch_office_value_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {

			}

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_pop_growth_speed }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_pop_growth_speed value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_pop_growth_speed }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_pop_growth_speed value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_weapon_range_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_weapon_range_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_weapon_range_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_weapon_range_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

			limit = {
				NOT = {

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_disengage_chance_mult value < 85.000 }

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult_-10

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult_13

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_evasion_mult_20

				limit = {

				limit = {

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_-10

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_speed_mult value < -95.000 }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult value < 75.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_7 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_orbital_bombardment_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_1

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_4

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_windup_mult value < -85.000 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_winddown_mult value < 115.000 }

		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_ship_interstellar_speed_mult_-10

		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_morale }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_damage_mult value < 135.000 }

				}

			}
		}

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_morale_damage_mult_10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_morale_damage_mult value < 115.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_morale_damage_mult_11 days = -1 }

			else_if = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_morale_damage_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_-8

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_-6

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_morale_mult_-10 days = -1 }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_damage_mult value < 95.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_damage_mult_9 days = -1 }

			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_-10

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_10

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_13

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_17

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_morale_mult value < -95.000 }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_9 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_13 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 145.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_14 days = -1 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 155.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_15 days = -1 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 165.000 }

					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult value < 205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_damage_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_attack_health_mult value < -85.000 }

			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_health_mult value < 95.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_health_mult_9 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_defense_health_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-8

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-6

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-3

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult value < -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_army_experience_gain_mult_-10 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_11 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -125.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_12 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -135.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_13 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -145.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_14 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -155.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_15 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -165.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_16 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -175.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		 #first copy a backup of the old value, then take new value and update with randomnessfactor. If old value is different from new, update modifiers
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_tmp value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult }
		set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult }
		multiply_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = custom_difficulty_randomness_factor }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = custom_difficulty_tmp }
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 55.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -55.000 }

			}
			else_if = {

			else_if = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -105.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -115.000 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_11 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_12 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_13 days = -1 }

	id = custom_difficulty_mm.21
	 #Player
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = custom_difficulty_mm_country_known
		event_target:global_event_country = {
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_country_starbase_capacity_mult_Player }
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult value = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_terraforming_cost_mult_Player }

			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 55.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > 5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_3 days = -1 }

				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -105.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -115.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_11 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -125.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_12 days = -1 }

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_13 days = -1 }
			}

				limit = {

				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_14 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -155.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_15 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -165.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_16 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -175.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_17 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -185.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_18 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -195.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_19 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult value > -205.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_cost_mult_20 days = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult }
				}
			}
			set_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = event_target:global_event_country.custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult }
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_1
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_2
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_3
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_4
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_5
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_6
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_7
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_8
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_9
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_10
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_11
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_12
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_13
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_14
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_15
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_16
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_17
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_18
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_19
			remove_modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_20
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value = 0 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 95.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-10 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 85.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-9 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 75.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-8 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 65.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-7 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 55.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-6 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 45.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-5 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 35.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-4 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 25.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-3 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-2 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > 5.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_-1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -15.000 }
				}
				add_modifier = { modifier = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult_1 days = -1 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = custom_difficulty_MM_mod_armies_upkeep_mult value > -25.000 }

			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = custom_difficulty_mm.22
	 #update newly created countries without having to open menu
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = custom_difficulty_mm_country_known }
		has_global_flag = custom_difficultyMM_active
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.20 }
		}
		else = { country_event = { id = custom_difficulty_mm.21 } }
	}
}
